text: <!channel> FYI! Beam needs to turn the water off in our main kitchen on MONDAY 3/6 from 7:00am - 8:30am.

Hello friends. Your neighborhood IT group (Josh D'Errico, Josh D'Errico, (Actually Miguel), and NotJohn) has looked into the crappy Guest Network performance lately and was not confident that the Uncorked Guest network in the 390 area can be expected to work well going forward. Uncorked Sansa Guest has been deployed and uses the same password as Uncorked Guest. Please invite visitors who need the guest network to use Uncorked Sansa Guest and let's see how it holds up!
